titles.title: The earth is filled with the mercy of the Lord,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The earth is filled with the mercy of the Lord,
By His word were the Heavens made and the waters of the sea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
- La tierra está llena de la misericordia del Señor,
- Por Su palabra fueron hechos los cielos y las aguas del mar.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing to the Lord with instruments,
Sing to the Lord with Jubilee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
- Aclamad al Señor con los instrumentos,
- Aclamad al Señor con jubilo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sing to the Lord with instruments,
Sing to Him a new song.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
- Aclamad al Señor con los instrumentos,
- Cantadle un cántico nuevo.
